Key.English: Military Intelligence - DEPRECIATED! REMOVE FROM YOUR MISSIONS
Key.Chinesesimp: 军事情报 - 已弃用! 从任务中移除

Key.English: Strategic Military Intelligence - DEPRECIATED! REMOVE FROM YOUR MISSIONS
Key.Chinesesimp: 战略军事情报 - 已弃用！从任务中移除

Key.English: Display friendly units within this radius around players
Key.Chinesesimp: 显示此玩家周围半径内的友军单位

Key.English: place 1 Mil_Int module only per mission. Select the level of detail and frequency of intel received in the options. It is also possible to show Friendly Intel to track units friendly to players.
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个任务只放置1个Mil_Int模块. 在选项中选择接收情报的详细级别和频率. 也可以显示友军情报来追踪友军单位.

Key.English: Military Sector Display - DEPRECIATED! REMOVE FROM YOUR MISSIONS
Key.Chinesesimp: 军事部门显示 - 已弃用！ 从任务中移除

Key.English: Update sector markings every number of minutes entered
Key.Chinesesimp: 每隔数分钟更新区域标记

Key.English: Player Sector Display - DEPRECIATED! REMOVE FROM YOUR MISSIONS
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家区域显示 - 已弃用! 从任务中移除
